item.title: Sara add a quote by Richard Price
item.description: "falafel joint, jazz joint, gyro joint, corner. Schoolyard, creperie, realtor, corner. Tenement, tenement, tenement museum, corner. Pink Pony, Blind Tiger, muffin boutique, corner. Sex shop, tea shop, synagogue, corner. Bollywood, Buddha, botanica, corner. Leather outlet, leather outlet, leather outlet, corner. Bar, school, bar, school. People's Park, corner. Tyson mural, Celia Cruz mural, Ladi Di mural, corner. Bling shop, barbershop, car service corner." -- Richard Price

item.title: Sara add a quote by Malachy McCourt
item.description: "Resentment is like taking poison and waiting for the other person to die." -- Malachy McCourt
